description: From a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924, housed in a blue-green portfolio case with a title page; head and shoulders of young man looking at viewer with chin raised slightly; behind him is a green band of water with white crested waves; eyes also colored in green ink
inscription: LL in purple conté pastel pencil, below image: Probedruck II. | LRC of sheet, in pencil: E.163
portfolio: From Plate 9 from Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
signed: LR in purple conté pastel pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 23
title: Man at the Sea (Self-Portrait), Plate 9 from Das Gesicht (The Face)
